short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a new word every day, complete with a description, part of speech and example. Expand your vocabulary with this nifty extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Word of the Day extension allows you to see a new word, or phrase, every day.

Complete with the meaning, part of speech, pronunciation, and even the ability for your computer to speak the word out loud.

It's in a handy place, located in the top of your bookmarks bar. Don't forget to click the extension icon every day to see the new word!
